import "./framework.css"; import "./master.css"; import "./style1.css"; import "./dashbord.css"; import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext"; import { db } from "../fireba/firebase"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { doc, getDoc } from "firebase/firestore"; import profile from "./avatar.png"; import welcome from "./welcome.png"; import photo from "./profile-user.png"; import change from "./cigarette.png"; import setting from "./settings.png"; import friend from "./friends.png"; import multipe from "./multiple-users-silhouette.png"; export default function Dashboard() { const [error, setError] = useState(""); const { currentUser, logout } = useAuth(); const [userData, setUserData] = useState(null); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { const userId = currentUser ? currentUser.uid : "exampleUserId"; // Replace with the actual user ID getUserById(userId); }, [currentUser]); async function getUserById(userId) { try { const userDocRef = doc(db, "users", userId); const userDoc = await getDoc(userDocRef); } catch (error) { console.error("Erreur lors de la récupération de l'utilisateur: ", error); } } async function handleLogout() { setError(""); try { await logout(); navigate("/login"); } catch { setError("Failed to log out"); } } useEffect(() => { console.log(userData); // Log userData to see if it is being set correctly }, [userData]); return (
